Source.Name: newsbeuter
Source.Description: Open-source RSS/Atom feed reader for text terminals that runs on a variety of Unix-like operating systems. It features great configurability and a vast number of features for people who need a simple, fast reader that can completely be controlled via keyboard.

Package.Name: newsbeuter
